titles.title: Allied Partnership and Port Modernization Act
Allied Partnership and Port Modernization Act
A bill to permit the use of NATO and major non-NATO ally dredge ships in the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Allied Partnership and Port Modernization Act
This bill permits certain NATO-affiliated dredge vessels to operate in the United States. The vessels must be (1) documented under the laws of a NATO member country, (2) built by a NATO member country or a major non-NATO ally, and (3) majority-owned and -operated by entities incorporated in NATO member countries. (Current law generally requires that such vessels be domestically built and owned.)
